entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening and before morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
